author: danielsh

author: danielsh
msg: Calling 'svn status PATH' on a node that is not present in a working
copy shouldn't show the status as missing.
Calling svn status on non-versioned paths should just work.
Resolves a weird side effect from moving files in AnkhSVN.
The actual fix had to be reimplemented on the branch as the relevant code
